topic.title: Add Possibility to download ZeroNet from within ZeroNet :)
topic.body:
The title sais it all actually, I think the dashboard should contain a link, so everyone hosting a proxy would keep zeronet source also distributed :)

Richard

1604065411_mirrored_OliverCole_github.body: I second that, security and stopping XSS is important, and maybe this browser would make it way easier to spread/setup a local ZeroNet innstalation if its built into the plugin?
